docs.text: Data Data requests with FDSNWS Description of FDSN web services: web . availability : returns detailed time span information of what timeseries data is available at the archive. station : returns station metadata in FDSN StationXML format or as delimited text. dataselect : provides access to time series data for specified channels and time ranges. event : returns event (earthquake) information from catalogs originating from the NEIC and the ISC data centers. Most services also have a web interface to build URLs for data request. For example, for the IGN web service: http://193.144.251.72:8080/fdsnws/station/1/builder To request all responses: http://193.144.251.72:8080/fdsnws/station/1/query?level=response&formatted=true&nodata=404
docs.title: Data requests
